snippet: Phil Mickelson played for the first time in nearly two decades without his faithful sidekick, but was unfazed and stayed in contention on Friday at the WGC-Mexico Championship in Mexico City....

headline.main: US Judge Defers Ruling in Kansas Voting Citizenship Case
headline.print_headline: US Judge Defers Ruling in Kansas Voting Citizenship Case

lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson played for the first time in nearly two decades without his faithful sidekick, but was unfazed and stayed in contention on Friday at the WGC-Mexico Championship in Mexico City.
